body.name: Nido NESTLE Kinder 1+ Powdered Milk Beverage 1.76 lb. Canister
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 8 mins
features: Specially formulated for children 1-3 years old. NIDO 1+ starts with the goodness of milk, and also includes vitamins, minerals, and prebiotics to support growth, development, and a healthy immune system.
Every glass of NESTLE NIDO 1+ helps support your child's healthy immune system with Vitamins A, C and B6, as well as Iron and Zinc.
NIDO 1+ has a delicious taste of honey that your kids will love.
Makes approximately 23 servings of 8-fluid ounces of milk beverage
body.description: Specially formulated for children 1-3 years old, Nestle Nido Kinder 1+ is a powdered milk beverage with 13 vitamins and minerals and an exclusive blend of fiber to help maintain a healthy digestive system. It’s just what you need to help support your child’s growth, development and a healthy immune system.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,798 in Grocery & Gourmet Food (See Top 100 in Grocery & Gourmet Food) #7 in Powdered Milk

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vitamins: 15% DV of Vitamin A. 20% DV of Vitamin B1. 20% DV of Vitamin B6. 30% DV of Vitamin C. 15% DV of Vitamin D. 25% DV of Vitamin E. 10% DV of Pantothenic Acid. 25% DV of Folic Acid. 10% DV of Biotin. 20% DV of Niacin. Minerals: 35% DV of Calcium. 20% DV of Iron. 25% DV of Zinc. Nutrients: 37% DV of Protein. 1 gram of Fiber. Nestle NIDO Kinder 1+ Powdered Milk Beverage About NIDO Ideally, a well-balanced diet would meet the nutritional needs for young children aged one to three years. However, sometimes it’s tough to get kids to eat right, so ensuring they get the vitamins and minerals they need is a helpful reassurance. NIDO 1+ was developed to meet the needs of children 1 years of age and older, and as part of a mixed diet, it helps to provide the specific nutritional requirements that are important for toddlers as they transition from breast milk or infant formula to the family diet. Nestle NIDO Kinder 1+ is a powdered milk beverage with 13 vitamins and minerals to help support your child’s healthy growth and development. NIDO 1+ also contains Prebio1, an exclusive blend of fiber. Fiber helps to maintain a healthy digestive system. Note: NIDO 1+ is not suitable for children under 1 year of age.

Storage Instructions Keep container tightly closed in a cool, dry place. No need to refrigerate powdered product. Make sure to refrigerate product once in liquid form. Discard unused prepared NIDO drink after 24 hours. Available Sizes 12.6 oz (360 g) – Servings per container: 10. 28.1 oz /1.76 lb (800 g) – Servings per container: 23. 56.3 oz /3.52 lb (1.6 kg) – Servings per container: 47. 4.85 lb /2.2 kg (club can) – Servings per container: 64. Note: 1 Serving = 8 fl oz/ 1 cup. Preparation Instructions To Prepare A Single Glass (8 fl oz): Add 4 scoops or 4 tablespoons of NIDO 1+ to 1 cup (8 fl oz) of warm water; mix well. To Prepare A Pitcher (32 fl oz /1 Liter): Add 16 scoops or 16 tablespoons of NIDO 1+ to 4 cups (32 fl oz /1 Liter) of warm water; mix well. Tip: To avoid clumping, ensure that the utensil is dry before scooping the NIDO powder. When preparing, make sure to always add NIDO powder to water, not the reverse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only formula my daughter could tolerate
reviews.reviewText: I have no complaints with this great product. My daughter was breast fed, but when she had to go to formula it became a nightmare. All the brand name formulas produced horrible gas and she was miserable. Tried the most expensive one good for gas, it smelled so bad and she wouldn't drink much of it and made her skin even stink! Switched to the Aldi store grand and she was good as gold! Until they quit carrying formula. I decided American made formulas were just not good, sorry to say, so I bought this product and she was perfect on it and seemed to love it the most! Only issue now is it seems cheaper to buy it in the store now, but I highly recommended this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this formula now that my baby has past her first birthday. The transition from similac to nido was smooth for my baby’s stomach. And she loves the taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good for the next step from formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves it
reviews.reviewText: Love it! My lil one drinks this milk and also started eating food nicely. So happy with this product. Amazing taste and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to have on hand.
reviews.reviewText: I actually use this for baking and cooking. I don't drink milk, but so many recipes call for milk. I've been buying this a few years now and it's really nice to not have to buy milk and then throw half of it when it goes bad. Easy to measure and dissolves nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 15 month niece, but the expiration date is in 3 month while the box is not in a good condition. However, I can't return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the best one
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I wanted to use it for my smoothies and as well as my way of making hot coco with it. I got the wrong one but is still works!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This was a lot less than wat I got the last time
reviews.reviewText: It was alot smaller than the last time I received 3.ounces last time not worth the money
